attributes.action: To stop the public taking photos and videos of Police  Officers whilst on duty and down loading onto social media
attributes.additional_details:
The taking of photographs and videos of Police Officers, whilst on duty, and then downloaded to social media sites; with offensive and defamatory remakes against them should be made a criminal offence like it I for the general public who do this against  others.
This Not only  puts the Police Offers in danger but their families in danger as well.
